name: Mini-Dead (itch)
description:
THIS IS NOW ON STEAM AND IS SUPERIOR IN EVERY WAY

https://store.steampowered.com/app/851530/MiniDead/

Mini-Dead is a short but intense boss fighting game, using a simple but incredibly effective game mechanic. The browser version has been limited to work with HTML5 but for the full experience download the EXE! My good friend exported a linux version which I have no way to test if it works. If there's any issues let me know!

  • Left mouse button only! The ultimate hardware for reflex based game play.
  • 144fps. If you have the monitor capable of reaching 144hz then this game is a bit mental to behold.
  • Original soundtrack by Paul Michael Cardon in the crispy keygen style. Listen to it here: https://ninjaottermusic.bandcamp.com/releases
  • Cheeky secrets...

Mini-Dead was created to help bridge the gap between the release of it's bigger, harder version called Dead found here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/527150
